page.title: 09My day at Kingsley school
page.content: 7.45 am I got up and had a breakfast of Rice Krispies. 8.40 I walked to school. 8.55 The bell rang and I went into my classroom (Mrs Smith's). 9.00 We had Assembly. 9.30 We had an English lesson from the Primary Language Programme. 10.30 Playtime. 10.45 We had a Mathematics lesson. 11.30 We had lunch. 12.30pm I went out to play. Some children went to recorder club. 1.15 Religious Educ. with Mr Davis. 2.15 Playtime. 2.30 Physical Education (PE) with Mr Wonham. 3.00 Reading - Wide Range Readers. 3.30 End of school - we went home. 5.15 We had tea. 6.00 Played at home. 9.15 Went to bed.
